tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Started the year with a wire-to-wire win at the SwingThought.com Tour MetroWest Event in Orlando. Shot 66-67-69 to win by six at 202 (-14)… Played 11 tournaments on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, where he collected a victory, three top-10s and five top-25s on seven cuts made… Finished the year ranked 14th on the Order of Merit… Playing on a sponsor exemption he finished T5 at the Mazatlán Open in March on his first career start on Tour. That result helped him earn exempt status as the Order of Merit's leading non-member after the midseason reshuffle… Became the first Canadian player to win a PGA TOUR Latinoamérica event at the 89th Hyundai - BBVA Abierto de Chile in October. Shot 66-68-63-67 with a birdie at the 72nd hole for a one-stroke win over Rafa Campos. His total of 264 (-24) set a new 72-hole record for both PGA TOUR Latinoamérica and the Club de Golf Los Leones. At age 22 years, 26 days, he was the youngest to win this season in Latin America… Earned exempt status through the first six events on the Mackenzie Tour PGA TOUR Canada with a T8 finish at the Canada Q-School, but had a W/D and three MC in just four starts… Earned Web.com Tour conditional status for the 2016 season with a T79 finish at Q-School final in December.

2014: Missed the cut on his two starts on PGA TOUR Canada.

2013: Missed the cut in all six of his starts on PGA TOUR Canada.

2012: Turned pro in May… Shot three rounds in the 60s on the way to a T8 finish at the ATB Financial Classic presented by TELUS. That was his only top-25 finish in seven starts on PGA TOUR Canada, where he finished the year ranked 55th on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played one season of college golf at San Diego State University (2011-12)… Won CN Future Links Pacific… Ranked No. 1 Junior in Canada in 2011… Won the Alberta Junior Championship in 2011… Former member of Team Canada Developmental squad.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf was playing with Arnold Palmer…Favorite course he's played is St. Andrews, but he still wants to play Augusta National…Dream foursome would include his brother, Rory McIlroy and Tiger Woods…Twitter name is @WilsonBateman… Instagram name is @wilcb8
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - 2015 Tournament Winner / Order of Merit Top-60
Finished T79 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T8th in 2012 at the ATB Financial Classic presented by TELUS.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T53rd in Total Eagles on the PGA TOUR Canada.
